extendedInfo.description: A fun and exciting way to way to spice up a party, or spice up your love life.  All you have to do is to pick a category for the occasion and roll away. PD works great if youâre trying to start a fun drinking game with your friends.  It also works great if youâre trying to become more intimate with a special someone in a new kinky way. Roll the dice by shaking your phone to receive a command and prepare to get wild.  The game comes preloaded with a set of categories, but can be customized to fit everyoneâs needs.  Other features provided in this game include the ability to take customized pictures of the users and the ability to share your adventures on facebook.Become the life of the party with Party Dice, and try to explore more with your own idea.Features:*Free and ad-free app *Fun for drinking games, spicing up your romance, or just stimulating your day*Customizable to meet everyoneâs wishes and needs*Nice User interface, compact size*Show both portraits on the main screenOthers: Like the app and share experience with other users on our official facebook page: http://www.facebook.com/PartyDiceThe home screen background image is from the link: http://fav.me/d24j29vThanks to the designer.

reviews.title: Great~
reviews.comment: It works great in my phone. Good for parties.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Simple yet fun. 5 stars for more dice designs
reviews.author: Paul Vincent Dimayuga

reviews.title: FUN!
reviews.comment: I really enjoy this app. This has worked wonders when my girlfriend and I are alone late at night.  It\'s simple gets you to do things you might not normally do.  I highly suggest installing this app!
reviews.author: A Google User
